f013f9a8-a23d-44c5-ac3b-86eb793ac622.script:
You might think you’ve gone too far for God to forgive you. But the truth is, He already made a way before you even asked.

We’ve all messed up. Lied. Hurt people. Walked our own way. Sin isn’t just bad choices—it’s separation from the God who made us. And no matter how hard we try, we can’t fix that on our own.

But God didn’t wait for us to reach Him. He came down to us in Jesus Christ. Jesus took our punishment on the cross, died, and rose again—defeating death itself. That’s not religion. That’s rescue.

You don’t earn it. You just believe it. “Everyone who calls on the name of the Lord will be saved.” (Romans 10:13)

If you’re ready, say, “Jesus, I believe You died for me. Forgive me. Make me new.”

You’re not too far gone. You’re the reason He came.
f013f9a8-a23d-44c5-ac3b-86eb793ac622.error: Video generation failed: 'ImageClip' object has no attribute 'fadein'

b5b5d63e-9ba7-4c2e-968f-d054639dc4bc.script:
Imagine this,
you’re smiling in photos, but you feel empty inside.
You’ve chased success, love, pleasure,
but somehow, it’s never enough.

You scroll, you laugh, you post,
but when it’s quiet, the weight hits.
Something’s missing.

That missing piece isn’t a thing, it’s a Person.
The One who made you.
The One you’ve been running from since the start,
and still, He’s been running toward you.

His name is Jesus.
He saw your sin, your shame, your secret thoughts,
and loved you anyway.
He went to the cross to pay for it all.
Three days later, He walked out of the grave,
alive.

And now, He’s calling your name,
not to judge you,
to save you.

You don’t have to clean yourself up,
you just have to come.
“Everyone who calls on the name of the Lord will be saved.” (Romans 10:13)

This isn’t just a story,
this is your invitation.
Life, freedom, forgiveness,
it’s all waiting for you.
b5b5d63e-9ba7-4c2e-968f-d054639dc4bc.error: Video generation failed: 'VideoFileClip' object has no attribute 'subclip'
